::Bloodystrike::

Bloodystrike hesitates for a moment before dropping his guns and 
various other weapons. He disliked being unarmed, but he guessed it 
was neccessary.

"Allrighty, I'm unarmed," he says through his comm to the merchants.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Ralph Ares" <ralph@i...> wrote:
> (A tight beam transmission emanates from behind the ENMP defense 
shield to
> Bloodystrike)
> 
> "Welcome, friend! Please, for your safety, do not try to cross the 
field
> prematurely. First we would like you, for our safety, to leave your 
weapons
> on the outside surface of the defense field - they will remain 
suspended
> there until you return. After you have done so, a five meter by 
five meter
> opening will appear. Please then proceed to the camp site on the 
northern
> most point of the south island, we will do business there." End 
transmission
